prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If candidates are provided, you MUST choose one of them (even if it slightly overshoots quantity) and justify the pick—never return null when at least one candidate exists.
        Only when no candidates are supplied may you set `selected_product_id` to null, and those notes must begin with `MISSING_SKU:` so the pipeline can flag the meal for removal.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_FAM_SLOW_60PLUS_LATAM",
  "name": "Family Set-and-Forget Slow Cooker (Mexican & Latin American)",
  "core_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Mexican",
      "LatinAmerican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "60Plus"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "SlowOrPressureCooker"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "FromScratch"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Slow Cooker Pork Carnitas Tacos (Mild)",
  "description": "Hands-off, citrus-scented shredded pork finished with a quick skillet crisp for tender, taco-ready carnitas. Mild and family-friendly.",
  "servings": "Serves 6",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Trim excess fat from the pork shoulder and cut into 3–4 large chunks.",
    "Peel and thickly slice the onions.",
    "Peel and lightly smash the garlic.",
    "Juice the orange and lime into a small bowl.",
    "Measure ground cumin, oregano, salt, and black pepper."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Add the sliced onions and smashed garlic to the slow cooker as a base.",
    "Place pork shoulder chunks on top. Sprinkle ground cumin, oregano, salt, and black pepper over the pork.",
    "Pour in the orange juice and lime juice. Tuck in the bay leaves.",
    "Cover and cook on Low for 8–10 hours (or High for 4–5 hours) until the pork is very tender.",
    "Transfer pork to a tray, discard bay leaves, and shred the meat with two forks. Skim fat from the cooking juices.",
    "Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat on the stovetop. Add olive oil.",
    "Spread a layer of shredded pork in the hot skillet; spoon over a little of the cooking juices. Cook 3–5 minutes without stirring to crisp edges, then toss once. Repeat with remaining pork.",
    "Warm tortillas on a dry skillet 30–60 seconds per side until pliable.",
    "Serve pork in warm tortillas with salsa, sliced avocado, and shredded lettuce."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "pork shoulder",
      "quantity": "3–4 lb",
      "preparation": "trimmed and cut into chunks"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "onions",
      "quantity": "2 medium",
      "preparation": "peeled and thickly sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "6 cloves",
      "preparation": "peeled and lightly smashed"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "orange",
      "quantity": "1 large",
      "preparation": "juiced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lime",
      "quantity": "1",
      "preparation": "juiced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "ground cumin",
      "quantity": "2 teaspoons"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "oregano",
      "quantity": "2 teaspoons"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt",
      "quantity": "2 teaspoons"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "black pepper",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "bay leaves",
      "quantity": "2"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "1–2 tablespoons"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "tortillas",
      "quantity": "12 small"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salsa",
      "quantity": "1 cup"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "avocado",
      "quantity": "2",
      "preparation": "sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lettuce",
      "quantity": "1/2 head",
      "preparation": "shredded"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "LatinAmerican",
      "Mexican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "60Plus"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],

      "Mild"
    ],

      "None"
    ],

      "HighProtein"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "SlowOrPressureCooker",
      "StoveTop"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "FromScratch",
      "SemiPrepared"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
